name: Cursed Connection
description:
A Wizard Cursed the player character now the platforms and enemys are joined to his movements. Break the Connection  by defeting the Wizard at the top of his tower. 

The platforms move when the player either  jumps, dashes or ducks.  And the enemies attack when the player either  jumps, dashes or ducks.  The player is also tied to the enemies, because the only way for the player to attack the enemies, is for them to reflect their attacks.

I made all the assets.  Some of the assets I made before the game Jam like the music, But I made most of the Art  and other assets Durring the Jam.
